member.name: IIsolatedProcessLauncher.AllowSetForegroundAccess
member.summary: Allows the remote window to reflecting what is going on in the container.
member.returns: Returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: IIsolatedProcessLauncher.GetContainerGuid
member.returns: Returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: IIsolatedProcessLauncher.IsContainerRunning
member.summary: Determines if a container is running or suspended.
member.param: The running parameter is set to true if the container is running, or false if the container is suspended.
member.returns: Returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: IIsolatedProcessLauncher.LaunchProcess
member.summary: Launches a process inside the container.
member.param: The arguments to pass to the process.
The working directory of the process.
member.returns: Returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: IIsolatedProcessLauncher.ShareDirectory
member.summary: Shares a host directory into the container, either as read-only or supporting modification.
member.param: The path to the directory on the host to share.
The path to the directory in the container to map to the host path.
Determines if the directory is shared as read-only or read-write.

member.name: IIsolatedProcessLauncher
member.summary: Enables apps to determine whether processes are running in a Microsoft Defender Application Guard (MDAG) container (VM container environment).
